name: Dream Coaster VR
description: Dream Coaster VR is an extremely realistic roller coaster simulator equipped with series of different environmental themes and ultra immersive impression of height and speed. Do not let the name trick you - this roller coaster will surely keep you wide awake!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel Core i5-4590 or AMD FX 8350 (equivalent or better) Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD Radeon R9 290 (equivalent or better) DirectX: Version 9.0c Storage: 2 GB available space
